title: Adobe InDesign CS6
description:
To install Adobe InDesign CS6:

1. Turn off WiFi or Internet.
2. Mount InDesign_8_LS16.dmg and install Adobe InDesign CS6 as a trial version.
3. Once installation finishes, launch the app and then close it.
4. Extract amtlib.zip. A file called amtlib.framework should appear (the extracted filesize should be 6mb).
5. Go to Applications/Adobe InDesign CS6/Adobe InDesign CS6.app.
     5.1Right click the Adobe InDesign CS6.app and click "Show Package Contents".
     5.2 Go to Contents/Frameworks.
     5.3 Create a backup of the original amtlib.framework file.
     5.4 Copy amtlib.framework to the Frameworks folder and overwrite the original    file.
6. Do the macarena.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
